name: Alfred-uri-parser
body:
# alfred-uri-parser
URI parsing workflow for Alfred

During development, have you ever found yourself copying a link from the browser and trimming it to fetch the host to ssh into that box for debugging? This is a simple tool that helps you parse segments of the URI to copy what you need.

Follow me on Twitter ([@deekulkarni](http://twitter.com/deekulkarni)) for updates.

###Usage:
* Copy any URI (Example: https://github.com/dkulkarni/alfred-uri-parser/edit/master/README.md) to clipboard
* On Alfred, type **uri**
* Press ENTER to copy the segment of the URI

![Usage](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1425767/10409890/36aba722-6f4e-11e5-8edf-d9a93e6de703.jpg)


###Download:
[Download the workflow](https://github.com/dkulkarni/alfred-uri-parser/blob/master/workflow/uri-parser.alfredworkflow?raw=true)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
